plain: Most of the movies listed are romantic comedies, dramas, or action/adventures. The settings are mostly modern, but there are a few period pieces. The visual style is mostly modern, but there are a few older movies with a more classic visual style. The writing style is mostly modern, but there are a few older movies with a more classic writing style. The runtime is mostly modern, but there are a few older movies with a longer runtime. The themes are mostly modern, but there are a few older movies with more timeless themes.
